attributes.additional_details:
Ministry of Defence: Stop licensing the sale of military equipment to Israel until there is a lasting peace with the Palestinians.

It is the policy of the British government not to provide arms to any government which may use them in human rights abuses. The Israeli military's operations in Gaza have unacceptable levels of civilian casualties. It is not appropriate, under British policy, for British-produced arms to be supplied to the Israeli army while this conflict continues.
